meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in the human intestines.
meanings.sent1: Klebsiellas can be helpful in our intestines.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study klebsiellas to understand gut bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The klebsiellas in our stomachs are like tiny helpers.
meanings.sent4: The world of klebsiellas in our bodies is like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a community of klebsiellas working together inside us.

meanings.definition: Infections caused by the bacteria Klebsiella.
meanings.sent1: The doctor treated the patient's klebsiellas carefully.
meanings.sent2: Klebsiellas can lead to serious infections if not treated.
meanings.sent3: The klebsiellas in the hospital caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The spread of klebsiellas was like a wildfire in the ward.
meanings.sent5: The danger of klebsiellas lurked in the hospital corridors.
